tha-ap201:0.3_0: Hearing this sal tree trunk, the senior monks,
tha-ap201:1.1_0: “Let them not spat out the world,
tha-ap201:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
tha-ap201:2.1_0: They wandered for alms and had their meal.
tha-ap201:2.2_0: the sage has left the city;
tha-ap201:2.3_0: he has completed the task and is awakened,
tha-ap201:2.4_0: they’re staying in the forest grove.
tha-ap201:3.4_0: He is the great hermit with the great hermit.
tha-ap201:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap201:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap201:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakkaṭa.
tha-ap201:8.1_0: The ninth flowers of the Flame Tree have been senior.
